company_code.label: Company Code
company_code.comment: Required. Your company code from the dashboard.

taxable_country.label: Taxable Country
taxable_country.comment: Address validation option works only for United States and Canada

region_filter_mode.label: Filter Requests by Region
region_filter_mode.comment: Re-save settings if Taxable Country was changed to use this option.

region_filter_list.comment: Select regions to use AvaTax services.

detail_level.label: Detail level
detail_level.comment:
Line: product rate will be used from Tax Line
Tax: product rate will be effective rate and is collected by jurisdiction

log_advanced.label: Enable advanced logs
log_advanced.comment: Collects related data for order, invoice and creditmemo

log_lifetime.label: Log Entry Lifetime
log_lifetime.comment: Required. Days before entries are auto-purged.

queue_success_lifetime.label: Successful Queue Lifetime
queue_success_lifetime.comment: Required. Days before entries are auto-purged.

queue_failed_lifetime.label: Failed Queue Lifetime
queue_failed_lifetime.comment: Required. Days before entries are auto-purged.

cust_code_format.label: Customer Code Format
cust_code_format.comment: Recommended: customer_id, Customer Code value has to be less or equal 50 symbols.

cust_code_format_attribute.label: Customer Code Format Attribute
cust_code_format_attribute.comment: Required: Code of customer attribute. Value of attribute will be sent to Avalara. Recommended: new customer attribute of type Text Field, Show on Frontend: no, Forms to Use In: Customer Account Edit or none. Attribute sample: customer_erp_id.

shipping_sku.label: Shipping Sku
shipping_sku.comment: Required. The sku sent to denote shipping costs.

shipping_tax_code.label: Shipping Tax Code
shipping_tax_code.comment: Required. Default is FR020100. More information about tax codes you can find at Avalara website

field_tax_subtypes.label: Fixed Tax Types
field_tax_subtypes.comment: Separated by comma. Active only if Custom Duty is Enabled.

gw_order_sku.label: Gift Wrap Order Sku
gw_order_sku.comment: Required. The sku sent to denote gift wrap order costs.

gw_items_sku.label: Gift Wrap Items Sku
gw_items_sku.comment: Required. The sku sent to denote gift wrap items costs.

gw_printed_card_sku.label: Gift Wrap Printed Card Sku
gw_printed_card_sku.comment: Required. The sku sent to denote gift wrap printed card costs.

adjustment_positive_sku.label: Adjustment Refund Sku
adjustment_positive_sku.comment: Required. The sku sent to denote positive ajustments.

adjustment_negative_sku.label: Adjustment Fee Sku
adjustment_negative_sku.comment: Required. The sku sent to denote negative ajustments.

sales_person_code.label: Sales Person Code
sales_person_code.comment: Optional. The sales person code for orders.

location_code.label: Location Code
location_code.comment: Optional. The location code for orders.

line_ref2_code.label: Reference Code 2
line_ref2_code.comment: Optional. An attribute code to pass with each product. See product attributes in catalog > attributes.

upc_attribute_code.label: UPC attribute code
upc_attribute_code.comment: Optional. Enter UPC attribute code. See product attributes in catalog > attributes.

validate_address.label: Address Validation
validate_address.comment: Require a validated address from AvaTax to checkout

validate_address_message.label: Multi-Address Address Validation Error
validate_address_message.comment: Only applies if address validation is enabled and shows ONLY for the multi-address checkout

normalize_address.label: Address Normalization
normalize_address.comment: Replace address with well-formed one from AvaTax

normalize_address_disabler.label: Customer can disable
normalize_address_disabler.comment: Allows customer to disable address normalization

onepage_normalize_message.label: Onepage Checkout Address Normalized Notice
onepage_normalize_message.comment: Only applies if address normalization is enabled

multiaddress_normalize_message.label: Multi-Address Checkout Address Normalized Notice
multiaddress_normalize_message.comment: Only applies if address normalization is enabled

error_notification_toolbar.label: Notification Toolbar
error_notification_toolbar.comment: If there are issues syncing invoice or credit memo data, show warning in admin notification toolbar.

limit_gettax_request_on_checkout_onepage.label: Limit tax calculation requests on OnePage checkout
limit_gettax_request_on_checkout_onepage.comment: Pay Attention. If any custom checkout (like OneStep Checkout) or some modification is used, this may not work properly and is recommended to be disabled.

limit_gettax_request_on_multishipping_ch.label: Limit tax calculation requests on Multi-Address Checkout

limit_gettax_request_on_noncheckout_acti.label: Disable tax calculation requests on non-checkout actions

shipping_insurance_sku.label: Shipping Insurance Sku
shipping_insurance_sku.comment: Required. The sku sent to denote shipping insurance amount.

region.comment: Set this to "*" (asterisk) to stop unneeded requests to Avalara and to help speed up page loads

postcode.comment: Set this to "*" (asterisk) to stop unneeded requests to Avalara and to help speed up page loads
